document.full_text: muammar gaddafi has not been injured in any way and continues to run the country, his spokesman said on friday, describing as "nonsense" a suggestion by italy's foreign minister that gaddafi had been wounded.
document.title: libyan government calls gaddafi injury report "nonsense"
lines_and_colors: muammar gaddafi has not been injured in any way and continues to run the country, his spokesman said on friday, describing as "nonsense" a suggestion by italy's foreign minister that gaddafi had been wounded.
